thread.section_title: Zodee Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zodee | zodee.com.au
thread.title: RoE

author: RoE
title: RoE
text: Very fast from clicking to receiving. However, I was, as it turned out, just below the threshold for free delivery (and free returns delivery as I later discovered). I would have liked, on the cart or check out page as I've seen other retailers do, to have a little notification "hey, you're only $10 away from free delivery (and free returns postage), do you want to keep shopping and buy something else so that you qualify?".
